data.text: @janesun0912 @BTS_twt Thanks! There's just nothing like it. 💜
@CajunBTSArmyMom @BTS_twt Thank you! I'm glad to get to know you as well 🤗
@ykjm141018 Totally understood and I feel the same.

@ykjm141018 @BTS_twt Absolutely love your story. I can relate to so many of your words. I’ve been meaning to start writing about my Army journey just as a keepsake for years to come. You did well. Happy Armyversary and I’m glad to get to know you! 💜

@ykjm141018 @BTS_twt I loved this! Thank you for sharing. My journey started a little later in early 2021, but I definitely related to a lot of this. I feel like I’ve become a kinder and more positive person because of them too. 💜
@ykjm141018 @BTS_twt Love your story, thank you for sharing!  💜🎉 https://t.co/7gNNYgDiqQ

To clarify, at the end I am meaning how people (not army) can't get past the language thing. People will always see them a certain way because of that. They truly are not underdogs . 💜🤗 hopefully you know what I mean there.
